context.description:
Use this wizard to export an application client project into a JAR file. Select the application project to export, and provide a directory and filename for the exported JAR file.
Select Export source files to include source files in the JAR file.
Select Overwrite existing file to replace an existing file.

Use this wizard to export an enterprise application project into an EAR file. Select the enterprise application project to export, and provide a directory and filename for the exported EAR file.
Select Export source files to include source files in the EAR file.
Select Overwrite existing file to replace an existing file.

Use this wizard to export an EJB module into a JAR file. Select the EJB module to export, and provide a directory and filename for the exported JAR file.
Select Export source files to include source files in the JAR file.
Select Overwrite existing file to replace an existing file.

Use this wizard to export a connector project into a RAR file. Select the connector project to export, and provide a directory and filename for the exported RAR file.
Select Export source files to include source files in the RAR file.
Select Overwrite existing file to replace an existing file.
